title: "Hexagon acquires digital twin company LocLab"
excerpt: "Hexagon has acquired LocLab, a German company that uses proprietary workflow technology and AI-based object recognition to help automate the creation of reality models for digital twin applications. LocLab’s in-house developed ‘toolchain’ can utilise several data input formats with a view to balancing speed,"
